The claim was supported by data from Pla: s website, which showed that 54% of their facilities are located in health professional shortage areas, rural, or medically underserved areas.
The data used to support the claim was o: Services Administration (HRSA) Shortage Area Database system, which is an agency of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services known for accurately identifying underserved areas.
